Summary: Nephew and I saw silent, cigar-shaped craft move, take off, then heard noises
divs: sighting detailsi have always wanted to report this to a legitimate source but never knew how. i have never forgotten my experience, it was shocking. my nephew (four years younger than myself) and i were up late at his house in downey, ca, playing super nes games in a back bedroom, drinking snapple, eating chips. late night. no drugs or alcohol involved whatsoever. we had a back door open, with a screen door in place since the temperature was warm. my nephew had his back to a window in the room. i was sitting on the floor, facing the television with my body angled 3\4 to this window. we played videogames for about a half hour or so and at one point, through the window, i saw a huge, cigar-shaped object slowly veer at an angle slightly downward in the sky, off in the distance. the object was luminous, mostly blue, with white at the center. i could get a sense of scale since i could see it behind the treeline across the street. seeing this, i went into a state or absolute horror, practically numb. i had trouble speaking, i was shocked and quite honestly afraid and in disbelief. my nephew was scared to turn around to see what i was looking at. i was finally able to yell "look!" and he turned around. he yelled "holy shit! what the f***?!" and slid off of the bed he was sitting on. thank god he saw it too because no one would believe just me. the object made no sound as it moved for several seconds. then it suddenly made a sharp angled turn upward and took off at a high rate of speed. gone. we were in disbelief, maybe even in shock, i don't know. we sat there and all we could say was "what the f***?!" over and over. we tried rationalizing it - traded theories. a blimp? no... no way it would move like that. a helicopter with searchlights? no, it was too big, too fast, and made no noise. we then heard something outside - and i swear to god i am not lying - we heard something outside the screen door that i can only describe as a garbled voice. we almost died. we looked at each other. neither one of us would say what we heard because i'm pretty sure we thought we were losing our minds. "what did you hear just now?" i said. he repiled "no, what did you hear?" we were scared shitless. this went on for what seemed like half a minute. we both imitated the sound and agreed on what we heard. after that i remember getting up the nerve to go outside in the dark to see what the noise was. we made some jokes to ease the tension. i didn't see anything but i will tell you this: we were so stunned by the experience we didn't know what to do for days. i'm an artist so immediately i went to sketch and color what we saw. i wanted to tell everyone. i think i even called the downey police department the next day. one item to note. when i first saw the object, my face went into such a look of horror that afterward my nephew told me he thought there was someone in the window with a gun! the date is sketchy, it was so long ago. i could preobably narrow the date down better if i had to. if you have read this far, i hope it means something. thank you for reading and doing what you do. i believe!
